name: Statera: Balance Restored
description:
Statera was known as one of the most peaceful villages in the land. Though few people knew what was hiding behind its appearance, and soon enough all of it will be revealed. Its whole reputation as a center of education was given by the two schools that were founded there.

During this tumultuous period, two gifted children full of potential were born. Their names were Reuben and Sapphire. Two bright minds, meant to change the fate of the land, once and for all.

As there’s nothing simple in life, the road to progress is paved with many challenges. Challenges indeed were needed to polish the two raw talents.

Follow the story of two childhood friends who have grown apart, now having to work together to find the stolen cores, and reestablish balance in their home village!

W, A, S, D - Movement Player 1 
I, J, K, L - Movement Player 2 
E - Interact Player 1 
O - Interact Player 2 
Left Ctrl - Skip Dialogues 
Esc - Pause Menu

Paul Rauca
